staff.name: roles_isBetaTester
staff.description: 1 if user is a course beta tester; null means user does not have course role assigned

staff.name: roles_isInstructor
staff.description: 1 if user is a course instructor; null means user does not have course role assigned

staff.name: roles_isStaff
staff.description: 1 if user is course staff; null means user does not have course role assigned

staff.name: roles_isCCX
staff.description: 1 if user is ccx coach; null means user does not have course role assigned

staff.name: roles_isFinance
staff.description: 1 if user is finance admin; null means user does not have course role assigned

staff.name: roles_isLibrary
staff.description: 1 if user is library user; null means user does not have course role assigned

staff.name: roles_isSales
staff.description: 1 if user is sales; null means user does not have course role assigned

staff.name: forumRoles_isAdmin
staff.description: 1 if user is a forum admin; null means that user does not have a discussion forum role assigned

staff.name: forumRoles_isCommunityTA
staff.description: 1 if user is a community TA; null means that user does not have a discussion forum role assigned

staff.name: forumRoles_isModerator
staff.description: 1 if user is a forum moderator; null means that user does not have a discussion forum role assigned

staff.name: forumRoles_isStudent
staff.description: 1 if user is student on the forum; null means that user does not have a discussion forum role assigned

staff.name: roles
staff.description: One of 3 values, 'Student', Staff' or null; null means that user does not have course role or discussion forum role assigned from edX data
